title: CreateDataContractRequest
description: Request to create a Data Contract entity.

displayName.description: Display name of the data contract.

entity.description: Reference to the data entity (table, topic, etc.) this contract applies to.

schema.description: Schema definition for the data contract.

semantics.description: Semantics rules defined in the data contract.

qualityExpectations.description: Quality expectations defined in the data contract.

reviewers.description: User references of the reviewers for this data contract.

effectiveFrom.description: Date from which this data contract is effective.

effectiveUntil.description: Date until which this data contract is effective.

sourceUrl.description: Source URL of the data contract.

termsOfUse.description: Terms of use for the data contract for both human and AI agents consumption.

security.title: Contract Security
security.description: Security and access policy expectations defined in the data contract.

sla.title: Contract SLA
sla.description: Service Level Agreement expectations defined in the data contract.

extension.description: Entity extension data with custom attributes added to the entity.
